attributes.action: BBC bias and the Scots referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC must be held to account for it's apparent pro-union bias and unbalanced coverage of the Independence debate. It can be seen as disrespecting the democratic process as well as the spirit of the Edinburgh Agreement.
